## AutocompleteRef type

A ref which contains a promise of the latest autocomplete response in order get the latest search intents.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type AutocompleteRef = MutableRefObject<Promise<AutocompleteResponse | undefined> | undefined>;
```
